snippet: Stocks have been rising steadily all month, probably because of better economic data and a cooling of tensions in Ukraine, Gaza and Iraq.
abstract: Stock market advances for fourth consecutive day as investors appear encouraged by continued decline in people seeking unemployment benefits; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index is pushed to new nominal high.
lead_paragraph: Stocks have been rising steadily all month, probably because of better economic data and a cooling of tensions in Ukraine, Gaza and Iraq.

headline.main: S.&P. 500 at High as Shares Rally
headline.print_headline: S.&P. 500 at High as Shares Rally
